Procurement Notice

Subject: Procurement of 100 Laptops

Date: 2023-09-14

Eligible Bidders: All interested and qualified bidders are invited to submit sealed bids for the procurement of 100 laptops.

Description of Goods: The laptops must be of the following specifications:

Intel Core i5 processor
8GB RAM
256GB SSD
Windows 10 operating system
Quantity: 100 laptops

Delivery Date: Within 30 days of contract award
